description: Cinnamon have anti-inflammatory effects, which may help lower the risk of heart disease, cancer, brain function decline.
Cinnamon is a natural anti-microbial, anti-biotic, anti-fungal and anti-viral agent.
Cinnamon has anti-biotic and anti-microbial effects that protect skin from irritations, rashes, allergic reactions, and infections.
One tablespoon of ground cinnamon contains: 19 calories. 0 grams of fat, sugar, or protein. 4 grams of fiber.
